show.show_description: The last year of elementary school as seen through the eyes of a class pet. A jaded 74-year-old lizard named Leo has been stuck in the same Florida classroom for decades with his turtle terrarium-mate. When he learns that he only has one year left to live, he plans to escape to experience life on the outside, but instead gets caught up in his anxious students' problems--such as an impossibly mean substitute teacher.

The series tells the bizarre misadventures of an anthropomorphic fast food team called the Aqua Teen Hunger Force, made up of Master Shake (A milkshake), Frylock (A box of fries) and Meatwad (A piece of ground beef), who live day to day with their grumpy neighbor Carl Brutananadilewski, an obese and grumpy forty-year-old.
Davey Stone, an alcoholic with a criminal record, is sentenced to community service under the supervision of an elderly referee. Davey is then faced with trying to reform and abandon his bad habits.
NFL Sports game.
